metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7199 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in MediaWiki before 1.19.19, 1.22.x before 1.22.11, and 1.23.x before 1.23.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted SVG file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7199` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1.23.4
mediawiki-classes - 1.23.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.23.4').
